topics.body:
"@ParagonCommander":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54b432e46368724e82110000#post_54b432e46368724e82110000
Since I can't play games on the weekdays, I'll just tell you where the Thirsty Grunt is.
He's in Halo CE in The Maw.
After the moment when Foehammer crashes, keep on going, looking to the right until you see a service tunnel. Go in there, keep looking to the right until you find another.
Go in there and the little guy should be there.
